name: Soul Keeper (Callum Gillespie)
description:
Soul keeper

Made for the Lost Cartridge Game Jam 3# in 40 hours. Designed to be on the gameboy so you can NOT make it bigger just imagine you're playing it on your little game boy :) Thanks for playing!!!!!

Controls: 

A D = Left and right

N M = A B buttons

Programming : Callum Gillespie

Art and design : Alfie Turner
